query.pigql: q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceCase.Alias}";q = filter q by 'IsClosed' =="false";q = group q by 'CaseNumber'; q = foreach q generate 'CaseNumber' as 'CaseNumber', sum('{{column(Static_Duration.selection, ["pigql_value"]).asObject()}}') as 'Total_Duration', sum('sum_last_activity') as 'Number_Days Since Last Activity';q = order q by ('Total_Duration' desc,'Number_Days Since Last Activity' desc);q = limit q 100

q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceCase.Alias}"; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == "false"; r = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceOpportunity.Alias}"; r = filter r by {{column(filter_forecast_category.selection, ["ForecastCategory"]).asEquality("ForecastCategory")}}; s = group q by 'Account.Name' left, r by 'Account.Name'; s = foreach s generate q.'Account.Name' as 'Account.Name', count(q) as 'count', coalesce(sum(r.'Amount'),0) as 'sum_Amount'; s = order s by {{cell(Field_Select.selection, 0, "value").asString()}} {{cell(static_1.selection, 0, "value").asString()}};s = limit s 100;

q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceCase.Alias}"; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == "false"; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate avg('{{column(Static_Duration.selection, ["pigql_value"]).asObject()}}') as 'avg_Duration';

q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceCase.Alias}"; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == "false"; q = group q by 'IsEscalated'; q = foreach q generate 'IsEscalated' as 'IsEscalated', count() as 'count', (count()) / sum(count()) over([..] partition by all)*100 as 'perc_Percent'; q = filter q by 'IsEscalated' == "true";

lens_1.query: q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceCase.Alias}"; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == "false"; q = foreach q generate first('CaseNumber') as 'CaseNumber', first('Account.Name') as 'Account.Name', first('Owner.Name') as 'Owner.Name', first('${Constants.CaseType}') as '${Constants.CaseType}', first('${Constants.CaseSeverityLevel}') as '${Constants.CaseSeverityLevel}', first('IsEscalated') as 'Escalated',avg('{{column(Static_Duration.selection, ["pigql_value"]).asObject()}}') as '{{column(Static_Duration.selection, ["measure_field"]).asObject()}}', first('${Constants.CaseStatus}') as '${Constants.CaseStatus}', ${Constants.CaseSLAQuery} ${Constants.CaseSupportLevelQuery} first('${Constants.CaseOrigin}') as '${Constants.CaseOrigin}';q = limit q 100;

parameters.text: Showing oldest 100 untouched cases. Click one cases to view more details
Cases with long duration and no activity
